description:
Shuffle a card from hand into your deck to draw 3 <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> at next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>.
Shuffle a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Twisted Fate</style></link> into your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Shuffle a card from hand into your deck to draw 3 Fleeting at next Round Start.
Shuffle a Twisted Fate into your deck.
flavorText: "I make my own luck." - Twisted Fate
name: Twisted Fate's Pick a Card
